column4: Inbound S Limestone at Transcript Ave
column5: A pedestrian is reportedly involved.  All inbound lanes are shutdown.

column4: Roadway closed between SuperAmerica station and Bank of Lexington (off Tates Creek Rd).
Closure due to pavement failure caused by a damaged fire hydrant as a result of a collision.
Detour via Lansdowne Dr to Malabu Dr until further notice.
